```{r}
rhc_clean |>
  ggplot(aes(x = sex, 
             fill=factor(death))) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(title = "Death females vs. males",
       x = "Gender",
       y = "Number of patients") +
  #scale_fill_manual(name= "Death", values = c("0" = "blue", "1" = "red")) +
  theme_minimal()
```
